reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I will focus more on details, as major things are ok - such as location etc.
reviews.title: decent room, good breakfast, good location

likes.disliked: — bathroom and towels beeing pretty old

reviews.text: I made reservation for a queen bed double room. Once i got to the hotel there was only 1 room available in the conditions required. The room was no larger than 12 sq meters, bathroom another 10 sq m. The window was facing a close building - 2 m away - so no possibility for natural light in the room.
reviews.title: good location, good rooms, nice personnel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So I went to the reception and asked for another room, even with 2 separate beds (altough we were a couple). They offered us a room in the building right close to the hotel - an apartment building owned partially by the hotel. The room was actually a junior suite at 1st floor, nice large windows facing the street and pretty spacious - at least 40sq m. Pretty clean too - but i was interested only in the sleeping details of the room as staying in Barcelona in a hotel room was not my objective..:) The city is great - you feel you could stay out there day and night.
reviews.title: Location, Location, Location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom was pretty poor - the sink being clogged in my case. The bed sheets and towels need to be changed - as they are pretty old and probably over used - you could smell the extra chlor used for washing.
reviews.title: Good location, hotel very average

reviews.text: The personnel was ok, they gave us directions and info requested - but nothing out of regular stuff.
reviews.title: excellent location

reviews.text: the location of the hotel is quite ok, but many rooms have a view to another building in about 1,5 meters distance - that means no (sun)light and no view (see pictures).
reviews.title: Not worth 4 stars
well situated
reviews.text: next problem was that I had to pay extra for the safe and they even wanted a deposit for the key. it was the first 4star hotel travelling on business, which wanted extra money for the safe!
the bathroom was quite small, but if you feel sick sitting on the toilet, it is ideal ;-). the bath tub was small and getting out you had to take care not to step on the toilet..
reviews.title: Four Star????

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the heating was not adjustable, if one feels hot or cold you could only switch between ON and OFF.
reviews.title: Outstanding Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: breakfast was quite ok, but the staff took the forks and knifes in front when placing it on the table. I did not ask when they washed their hands last time, but anyhow...
reviews.title: Stay somewhere else

reviews.text: September 26-30, 2007
reviews.title: The Cristal was not my kind of Palace

likes.disliked: — The water leak in the ceiling

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was my second organized tour since my college days some twenty years ago. I was on a tour organized by AHI International and we were to stay at the Cristal Palace for five nights.
reviews.title: Honeymoon Gift

likes.disliked: — hard bed, stiff towels, shotty wifi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While our brochure listed the hotel as four star, first-class, I'd say that was a generous description. The hotel was ideally located a mere five minute walk from Las Ramblas and one of Gaudi's buildings was right around the corner.
reviews.title: Excellent Location!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast and dinner were included in our package and served in the hotel's dining room. The food was fairly good, but by day four it would have been better to explore the local restaurants for dinner on our own.
reviews.title: Good location for exploring the city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our hotel room, a double, as I was traveling with my senior citizen mother, was adequate, and looked out to the court yard. My gripe with the room was in the bathroom. The first night I thought I heard water dripping and went to check the bathroom faucet. The dripping water was coming from the ceiling from the room above us!
reviews.title: Excellent location

reviews.text: Just returned from a four night stay at the Cristal Palace in Barcelona. We were slightly put out on arrival when we were told that our friends were not booked in although this was soon sorted out. We were given adjacent rooms in the Apartment Block next to the Hotel.
reviews.title: This Hotel Sparkles

likes.liked: — A modern clean and spacious hotel
likes.disliked: — Someone had been smoking in the room previously

reviews.text: Believe me, this is not a minus. The apartment was a two floor enormous room with large lounge area ,sofas TV, Fridge etc.
reviews.title: Great Location, Nice Staff

reviews.text: Upstairs on the Gallery landing were two beds plenty of wardrobe space and a very tasteful bathroom.We were absolutely delighted.
reviews.title: great location - to overpriced

reviews.text: Hotel restaurant served an excellant breakfast and the hotel is very clean (Bedding changed three times during our four day stay) Staff very helpful and obliging.The location is very good with the Passe De Gracia on minutes away and the Placa Catalnunia a short walk.Very handy for good quality shops and restaurants. Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay at the Cristal Palace
Excellent Hotel in a great location
reviews.text: This is a perfect hotel for a weekend in Barcelona. Really good location and you won't need to use public transport or taxis at all unless you are heading out of the city eg airport or Nou Camp. The rooms are nothing special but are clean and comfortable. The reatuarant and bar in the hotel aren't really up to much but there's lot's about. I've returned here about three times already and have no compliants. The staff are really friendly and make an effort to be nice!
